alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued October 17 at 9:52AM EDT until October 18 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected. * WHERE...Huron County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property along the lakeshore. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North-northwest winds will develop and rapidly increase this afternoon, with gusts along the shoreline reaching up to 40 MPH. This will causing rising water levels and high wave action that will result in some shoreline erosion.
info.instruction: Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to protect property from rising water levels.
